about_the_game:
In the game you have to explore the prison area. Perform various tasks of prisoners and guards. Look for and collect various items. Solve puzzles and riddles. You need to pass this test and get out to freedom.

I was surprised to end up in Alcatraz. Having the best lawyer, I had hoped to be acquitted. But all his efforts to get me acquitted were in vain. My sentence screamed: "Welcome to hell, son." And so I found myself among thieves, murderers and rapists. I was quickly given a nickname - Financier (I'm a financial analyst). According to the unspoken prison laws, I had to join one of the "gangs" - the prison community. It was the only way to survive. To survive and take revenge...

- A twisted plot.
- The player can use stealth - elements of tactics and stealth will help.
- Emphasis on realism (of course within the TDS genre).

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;
- availability in 2 languages.
